snippet: Having tried to block the economic recovery, House Republicans now claim they made it possible. The public is unlikely to be persuaded by these absurd boasts.
abstract: Editorial criticizes House Republicans for trying to take credit for the economic recovery, particularly reduced unemployment, despite their having opposed the policies that have made the recovery possible.
lead_paragraph: Having tried to block the economic recovery, House Republicans now claim they made it possible. The public is unlikely to be persuaded by these absurd boasts.

headline.print_headline: Taking Credit Where None Is Due
headline.seo: Taking Credit Where None Is Due
headline.main: Taking Credit Where None Is Due
